original_text: He also removed the male prostitutes who lived near the special altars. His father Asa had removed many of them when he ruled as king. Jehoshaphat removed those who were still there.
korean_text: 그가 그의 아버지 아사의 시대에 남아 있던 남색하는 자들을 그 땅에서 쫓아내었더라

sentences.original_text: He also removed the male prostitutes
who lived near the special altars
His father Asa had removed many of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 아사는 그들 중 많은 수를 제거했다

sentences.original_text: Jehoshaphat removed those who were still there
